get.description:
Sanity check.
This will let the user know that the service is operational.
And this path operation will:
* show a lifesign

parameters.description: Change the number of results returned.
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Change the number of results returned.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description:
Limit results by a certain country using two letter country code.
        (ex. /US)
parameters.name: country_id

schema.description:
Limit results by a certain country using two letter country code.
        (ex. /US)
schema.title: Country Id

parameters.description:
Limit results by a certain country using two letter country code.
        (ex. ?country=US or ?country=US&country=MX)
parameters.name: country

schema.description:
Limit results by a certain country using two letter country code.
        (ex. ?country=US or ?country=US&country=MX)
schema.title: Country

parameters.description:
Limit results by a certain city or cities.
        (ex. ?city=Chicago or ?city=Chicago&city=Boston)
parameters.name: city

schema.description:
Limit results by a certain city or cities.
        (ex. ?city=Chicago or ?city=Chicago&city=Boston)
schema.title: City
